readme_slowdraw: slow draw does the animations slower so you can see the paint ins
readme_lot8scue: lot8s_cue cues the sim on the 8s.
readme_serversideaudio: serverside_audio disables the built in music so that you can handle it in your streaming platform of choice
readme_loop: the loop command is the difference between weatherscan: the 4000 saga and a plain old domestic 4000.
readme_debug: debug you shouldnt need. its just a window rt that shows logging info.
readme_mixedcase: this setting toggles all caps in the local forecast segment's data.
readme_selectedflavor: E92 (36hr, EF, Radar), DE02 (CC, 36hr, EF, Radar). Currently you can pick between these two (they are both 1 minute).
readme_modern: this setting toggles the modern mode which is my take on a modern 4000.
readme_locationcode: This setting is how you set your 4000's location. Just 1 ICAO code and thats it! No ICAO code? Too bad. Get one.
readme_location_override: Optional: Override the display name for your location. Weather data still comes from locationcode, but this name will be shown instead.
readme_abbreviate_location_prefix: When true, abbreviates the first word of multi-word location names (e.g. New York -> N. York).
readme_cuetimes: This setting defines your local on the 8s cue times. this takes some time to understand. Heres how this works: x before the minute you want to cue on means on that time, every hour. o before the minute you want to cue on means on every other hour only. So you can cue on every 8 by adding x08,x18,x28,x38,x48,x58 into cuetimes. or for every other hour, o08,o18,o28,o38,o48,o58. you can mix and match too! x18,o48 is valid.
ad_crawl_messages: Please note this emulator is still in beta. If you encounter a bug or want to stay up to date with the latest on the emulator, join our Discord Server, Weather Ranch, at https://discord.gg/weatherranch
Weather Ranch - The better choice for simulations and forecasts.

Please note this emulator is still in beta. If you encounter a bug or want to stay up to date with the latest on the emulator, join our Discord Server, Weather Ranch, at https://discord.gg/weatherranch

The Weather STAR 4000 was a graphical processing and weather generation system used by The Weather Channel from 1994 to 2014. It has had a Pre-Graphical mode and a Graphical mode, and has survived as a fan favorite.
For a more in depth forecast, visit weather.com on your computer.
weather.com is your place for the latest in weather, news, and more!
